title: Warriors coach takes indefinite leave for surgery recovery
text:
Published By: ABC News: Sports - Today 
OAKLAND, Calif. -- Golden State Warriors coach Steve Kerr will take a leave of absence as he recovers from back surgery and will be replaced... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
